text:
I'm converting several tables to a pdf document using fop. I´m using both page 
headers and footers. 
Since the number of table rows is dynamic, sometimes some rows overwrite the 
page footer. I believe the problem remains in the fact that the foot area 
(heigth specified) is not being considered when the table is built, but only 
the page bottom margin.
creator: alexandre.lee@infosistema.pt

text:
Check whether your problem is related to
http://xml.apache.org/fop/faq.html#fo-region-overlap
and perhaps also upgrade to the latest FOP release.
If the problem persists, reopen the bug and provide a small, self-contained
FO document demonstrating the problem.
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de

text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
